text:
The Board of Supervisors hereby ratifies and approves all domestic partnerships formed after March 2, 2004 between otherwise qualified persons, where the partners neither resided nor at least one worked in San Francisco at the time they established their Domestic Partnership. All such domestic partnerships shall be deemed valid as of the date the persons submitted a signed Declaration of Domestic Partnership to the County Clerk or delivered a signed, notarized copy of a Declaration of Domestic Partnership to the person who witnesses the signing, as provided in Sections 
62.3(a)(1) or (a)(2). 
(Added by Ord. 78-04, File No. 040318, App. 5/6/2004)
